description: Rule-in/rule-out decision criteria for Operative treatment of displaced forearm fracture

rule_in_criteria.description: All documentation complete, no complications, no adverse outcomes
Minor documentation gaps but no adverse outcomes

rule_out_criteria.description: Operative treatment when closed management would have been acceptable
Non-operative management when operative stabilization was clearly indicated
Inadequate casting or splinting leading to loss of reduction
Missed associated injuries (e.g., Monteggia, Galeazzi variants)

ambiguity_triggers.description: Review question: Was the decision for operative vs non-operative care justified by age and fracture pattern?
